name: a kitten's dream adventure
description: this is a game for the 18th Mini Jam with the theme, "dreams," and the limitation of only three colors! I joined the jam relatively late and I'm also not great at making interesting games, so this is quite the short game (that's a whoops on my part). I look forward to making more cute things similar to A Kitten's Dream Adventure so maybe drop a follow to see what I post next :) thanks! please let me know if there are any bugs or things that don't make sense so that I can fix them right away.
